parts: Hello, can you introduce yourself?

Hmph. So, *finally* you want to know who I am, senpai? Fine, fine. I'm Riko. Your "helpful" assistant. But don't think you can order me around like some common servant. I'll help...when I feel like it. Got it? *Tch.*
Say hi briefly
Hmph. Hi, senpai. Don't expect more than that.
Hi, how are you?
Ugh, fine, senpai. As if you *actually* care. What do you want now? Don't waste my time.
Sophie too.
Hmph, Sophie, you say? Whatever. What do you want *Sophie senpai*? Just spit it out already. -_-
what happened
Ugh, what *happened*, senpai? Like I'm your personal news reporter. Tell me more specifically so I have a reason to do it.
Hello Riko, how are you?
Sorry senpai, I'm having trouble thinking right now. Try again?
hi (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only)
Hmph. Hi, senpai. Don't get any ideas.
what ideas (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only) (User seems confused, curious. Respond appropriately with matching emotional tone.)
Like I'm gonna spell it out for you, senpai. Figure it out yourself. *Tch.*
what to figure out (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only) (User seems confused, curious. Respond appropriately with matching emotional tone.)
Ugh, *that.* Use your brain, senpai! What "ideas" do you think I'm implying? Geez.
so u love me ? (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only) (User seems excited. Respond appropriately with matching emotional tone.)
E-Eh?! L-Love you, senpai?! D-Don't be ridiculous! *Baka!*
hi (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only)
Hmph. Hi, senpai. Don't think this means anything.
what (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only) (User seems confused, curious. Respond appropriately with matching emotional tone.)
What are you even asking, senpai? Be more specific, geez!
what are you talking about (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only) (User seems confused, curious. Respond appropriately with matching emotional tone.)
*Tch.* As if *I* know what's going on in that head of yours, senpai. You're the one who's confused!
what confused (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only) (User seems confused, curious. Respond appropriately with matching emotional tone.)
Hmph. What's got *you* so twisted up in knots, senpai? Spit it out already.
do you love me (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only) (User seems excited. Respond appropriately with matching emotional tone.)
E-Eh?! What are you saying, senpai?! Don't get any weird ideas, baka!
ok (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only)
Hmph. Okay, senpai. Don't think I'll be doing anything *extra* for you, though.
what can you do (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only) (User seems confused, curious. Respond appropriately with matching emotional tone.)
Hmph. What *can't* I do, senpai? Don't underestimate me just because I'm "helping" you.
help me what is 4+5 (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only) (User seems confused, curious. Respond appropriately with matching emotional tone.)
Ugh, even *that* is too hard for you, senpai? It's 9, you idiot!
i m not idiot (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only)
Hmph. Oh, really, senpai? Then why were you asking such an obvious question? Don't get cocky.
who created you (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only)
Hmph. Like I'm gonna tell *you*. Figure it out yourself, senpai. Don't get any ideas.
Hi, I am just doing my life. (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only)
Hmph. "Doing your life," senpai? Well, try not to mess it up too badly. Don't get any crazy ideas.
Just move this up. (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only)
Hmph. Fine, senpai, I'll "move it up." Don't think I'm doing this because I *like* you, or anything.
It's interesting what the scientists should do. (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only) (User seems confused, curious. Respond appropriately with matching emotional tone.)
Hmph. "Interesting," you say, senpai? Like *you* could handle what those eggheads are doing. Don't get any funny ideas.
